meanings.definition: A consequence, effect, or outcome of something.
meanings.sent1: The test results showed that she had studied well.
meanings.sent2: The results of the experiment were unexpected.
meanings.sent3: His love for spicy food always results in a runny nose.
meanings.sent4: The results of their teamwork were like a beautiful painting coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The results of the election were clear and decisive.

meanings.definition: To occur or happen as a consequence of something.
meanings.sent1: Skipping breakfast often results in feeling hungry later.
meanings.sent2: Careful planning results in a successful event.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to juggle too many tasks results in chaos.
meanings.sent4: The storm resulted in a power outage across the city.
meanings.sent5: Consistent practice results in improvement over time.

meanings.definition: To produce a particular outcome or consequence.
meanings.sent1: Hard work results in achieving your goals.
meanings.sent2: Proper care of plants results in healthy growth.
meanings.sent3: Mixing red and blue paint results in a purple color.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication resulted in a promotion at work.
meanings.sent5: Regular exercise results in better physical fitness.
